org.mindroid.api.robot

Interface IDifferentialPilot

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DifferentialPilot

    public interface IDifferentialPilot

    • Method Detail

      • driveDistanceForward

        void driveDistanceForward(float distance)
        Drive driveDistanceForward the given distance This is a blocked operation.
        Parameters:
        distance - - distance to drive in cm

      • driveDistanceForward

        void driveDistanceForward(float distance,
                          int speed)
        Drive driveDistanceForward the given distance This is a blocked operation.
        Parameters:
        distance - - distance to drive in cm
        speed - - speed

      • driveDistanceBackward

        void driveDistanceBackward(float distance)
        Drive driveDistanceBackward the given distance This is a blocked operation.
        Parameters:
        distance - - distance to drive in cm

      • driveDistanceBackward

        void driveDistanceBackward(float distance,
                           int speed)
        Drive driveDistanceBackward the given distance This is a blocked operation.
        Parameters:
        distance - - distance to drive in cm
        speed - - speed

      • driveForward

        void driveForward(int speed)
        Drives both motors synchronized forward. Method is unblocked.
        Parameters:
        speed - - speed of the motors [0-1000] deg/sec. Possible MaxSpeed depends on battery power!

      • driveForward

        void driveForward()
        Drives both motors synchronized forward. Method is unblocked. Note: Uses the current speed of the motor

      • driveBackward

        void driveBackward(int speed)
        Drives both motors synchronized backward. Method is unblocked.
        Parameters:
        speed - - speed of the motors [0-1000] deg/sec. Possible MaxSpeed depends on battery power!

      • driveBackward

        void driveBackward()
        Drives both motors synchronized forward. Method is unblocked. Note: Uses the current speed of the motor

      • flt

        void flt()
        Both motors will be set in flt mode. Motors are synchronized and method is unblocking

      • turnLeft

        void turnLeft(int degrees)
        Turn left by given degrees. This is a blocked operation.
        Parameters:
        degrees - degrees to turn

      • turnLeft

        void turnLeft(int degrees,
              int speed)
        Turn left by given degrees. This is a blocked operation.
        Parameters:
        degrees - degrees to turn
        speed - speed 0 - 1000

      • turnRight

        void turnRight(int degrees)
        Turn right This is a blocked operation.
        Parameters:
        degrees - degrees to turn

      • turnRight

        void turnRight(int degrees,
               int speed)
        Turn right. This is a blocked operation.
        Parameters:
        degrees - degrees to turn
        speed - speed 0 - 1000

      • stop

        void stop()
        Blocked synchronized stop operation. Left and Right motor will be stopped synchronized.

      • setMotorSpeed

        void setMotorSpeed(int speed)
        Sets the motor speed of left and right motors. Not a synchronized motor operation. Unblocking.
        Parameters:
        speed - - motorspeed
